actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for a graduated credit, in lieu of a deduction, for interest paid on a mortgage on a taxpayer's principal residence.

summary.text: Provides for a tax credit, under the Internal Revenue Code, of 25 percent of the interest paid or accrued on a mortgage secured by the taxpayer's principal residence. Provides that for every $500 of adjusted gross income of such taxpayer in excess of $30,000, such credit shall be reduced by an increment of 0.05 percent.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for a graduated credit, in lieu of a deduction, for interest paid on a mortgage on a taxpayer's principal residence.
